11.content: Okay then, now, what is your age group?
11.title: Male

111.content:
Now, who exactly are you?

Unknown - In a forest along the base of the mountain border, a newborn human babe has been abandoned by it's parents. It's cries attract a curious female monster, but as fate would have it, instead of devouring the tiny, defenseless thing, something about it awakens the beast's motherly instincts and it decides to raise the child as it's own.

Jaren - A young boy of six, playing hide and seek in the woods with his friends. Unfortunately, it turns out that he's too good at hiding, and his friends never find him. It's getting dark, and he finds himself lost in the forrest. He ends up walking straight into a drider's web, and upon being discovered, begs to be spared. The drideress decides to keep him around...as her personal servant.
111.title: Young child

1111.content:
The forest was said to b cursed, and had always been cursed for as long as anyone could remember. So long in fact, that nobody was even sure exactly what made it cursed in the first place anymore. But since the beginning of human civilization, almost nobody ever set foot in the woods at the base of the mountain.

Almost.

The woman sat atop a chestnut mare, as it trotted through the wood at a moderate pace. In her arms she held a small bundle wrapped in cloth, its contents sound asleep. She desperately wished she didn't have to do this, but she and her husband barely had enough food to feed themselves, let alone a hungry child.

She urged the horse to halt when she felt they had gone deep enough into the forest, and dismounted with the sleeping babe in her arms. She could not bare to look at the child one last time, lest she change her mind and face her husband's fury.

She placed the baby at the base of a large oak tree, and said a quick prayer, begging the gods to forgive her for this desperate and terrible deed before remounting her horse and galloping back the way she came.

The baby slept soundly for a few more hours before it finally awoke, and upon seeing it's parents nowhere in sight, began to cry. Before long, the infant's wailing caught the attention of a female monster that had been searching the woods for her next meal. Following the sound, she came across the babe and stared at it as it ceased its crying and just stared back in curiosity.

The monster sniffed the child and it giggled at the touch of the beast's nose. At first she thought she should just eat the thing, she was still hungry after all. But then, something deep within her began to stir. A sort of motherly instinct that said she couldn't leave this helpless child here alone, or it would surely perish. "Don't worry, little one." She said as she picked up the bundle and headed back home. "I'll take care of you."

What kind of monster will be our protagonists' new mother?
1111.title: The unknown baby

112.content:
Now, select your character.

Bal - A fifteen year old out hunting deer when he spots a dragon circling overhead. When the dragon begins to dive, he knows it has spotted him and he flees for his life. But it is in vain as the dragon captures him and carries him to it's lair in the mountains. Will it devour him? Or maybe it was simply lonely? Whatever the case, he's not likely to return home anytime soon.

Seth - A thief who grew up on the streets of the biggest city in the West. Having the mastered the art of picking pockets and locks, as well as burglary, he hears a local countess has recently inherited a very valuable jewel, that would be sure to set him up with enough gold for the rest of his life! Infiltrating the countess' estate,he soon finds he has bitten more an he can chew when ends up captured by the countess herself, who just so happens to be a vampire matriarch. She's not too happy about Seth breaking into her home and robbing her. What happens from there is up to you.
112.title: Teenager

113.content:
Who will you be?

Willem - A vile brute of a man, who drinks like a fish and regularly beats his wife and children on an almost daily basis. But Karma is about to catch up with this terrible man as late one night after having drunk himself into a stupor and wandering the city, he decides to stop in at the local brothel. What he doesn't realize is that the courtesans there are all succubi, who are more than happy to teach a lesson in true pain, the likes of which he will never forget, if he survives.

Sir Roderick - A member of the Order of the Crimson Blade, an elite group of knights who specialize in slaying many monsters. Roderick has been contracted to exorcise the King's daughter, who has been possessed by a malevolent spirit. Can he succeed? Or will something go horribly wrong?
113.title: Adult

12.content: Now then, what is your age group?
12.title: Female

121.content:
Just who are you?


Anna - A seven year old peasant girl living with her abusive father after her mother had died of illness. One night, she runs away from home into a nearby forest. She sees sparkling lights in the distance and follows them. The lights turn out to be a swarm of mischievous fairies, who feel sorry for poor little Anna, and offer to teach her father a lesson on what happens when you mistreat your children. A very harsh lesson.

Gwendolyn - While foraging through the woods for food, nine year old Gwendolyn accidentally stumbles across a half flooded underground cavern inhabited by mermaids. She quickly befriends a couple of them, and they offer to take her change her into a mermaid herself. But in doing so, she would have to leave her old life and family behind. Will she accept?
121.title: Young child

info.brief_description: You are a human in a fantasy world populated by mythical beasts. Can you survive?
info.description:
In this world, there are two classifications of intelligent beings, Humans and Monsters. From the very beginning, both of them have been at constant war. Monsters, being generally larger, stronger, and in some cases possessing magical abilities, have always sought to enslave or devour whatever humans they find, whereas the humans simply struggle to survive and continue the existence of their race.

In present times, the two are largely divided by an immense mountain range that stretches from one end of the continent to the other, separating humanity from most of the monster races. But occasionally, monsters are still sighted on the western side of the mountains where the humans reside, having found a way around the treacherous range by one means or another.

You, a human of the west, just so happen to run into one such monster. What happens next, is up to you.

Rules

1. Nothing gory or disgusting.

2. Feel free to include any sort of mythical creature, but nothing from movies like xenomorphs or stuff like that.

3. As far as sexual content goes, just don't make it the whole story. Throw some plot in here and there. Unless minors are involved, in which case, no sexual content period.

That's all for now. Hope you enjoy!
